content:
I think that's a great idea! Having a slideshow or photo booth will add a personal touch to the party and make it even more memorable for your parents. It's a wonderful way to celebrate their 30 years of marriage and create new memories with family and friends.

For the slideshow, you could also consider asking family members and friends to contribute photos or stories about your parents. This will make the slideshow even more special and meaningful, and give your parents a chance to see how much they're loved and appreciated.

As for the photo booth, you could set it up in a designated area with props and backdrops, and have a few fun signs or banners with your parents' names and anniversary date. You could also consider having a polaroid camera or instant printer to print out the photos on the spot, so guests can take them home as a keepsake.

Remember to have fun with the planning process, and don't hesitate to ask for help or advice along the way. Your parents are going
